item.description:
Get ready to get sweaty.

It's again time to descend upon the Cantab Lounge in Cambridge's Central Square for a night of dancing to The Chicken Slacks.  The Chicken Slacks always bring it each and every Thursday night, but a show to kick off the official start of summer is certain to be special.

I suspect that a lot of you are taking Friday, 1 July off to begin a four day celebration of the 4th of July, so why not kick it off with a vengeance by joining your fellow Meetup members for a night of R&B and Soul Bacchanalia?

Notes:

  • The music starts at 9:30 and continues until 1:30.
  • The cover charge is $5 at the door.
  • The Cantab is cash only -- no plastic.
  • The Cantab is on the small side and can fill up; there are sometimes waiting lines outside....
  • I'll be there sometime after 9.  But I also may get some dinner and 'warm up' next door at the Tavern on the Square.  (If others are interested in this, I may organize a pre-Meetup meetup.)
  • The Cantab is located steps from the Central Square Red Line T station.
  • Some street parking is available near the Cantab.  It's generally free after 8, but a couple of small lots are not free until 10.  Please be sure to check signs.
  • There's also a taxi stand on the same block on Mass Ave.
  • This is a joint meetup with the Boston Live Music group.
item.how_to_find_us: I bear an amazing resemblance to my profile picture and, as an additional aid to those looking for me, I'll force myself to hold a beer. (cell phone # sent to all attending members at 12:40p, 30 june.)
item.name: Let's kick off summer with The Chicken Slacks!
